command_descriptions.interactive: Fully interactive mode that guides the user through all steps.
command_descriptions.process: Process a JSON file according to its detected type.
command_descriptions.chunks: Split a large JSON file into smaller chunks and optionally process them.
command_descriptions.match: Establish matches between JIRA tickets and Confluence pages.
command_descriptions.unified: Execute a complete flow: JIRA + Confluence + Matching
command_descriptions.clean: Clean sensitive data (API keys, credentials, etc.) from JSON files.

prompts.select_file: Select the JSON file to process:
prompts.select_file_chunking: Select the large JSON file to split:

prompts.select_file_process: Select the JSON file to process:
prompts.select_file_chunks: Select the large JSON file to split:
prompts.select_dir_compress: Select the directory or JSON file to compress:
prompts.select_file_decompress: Select the ZST file to decompress:
prompts.output_file_json: Output JSON file (empty = same name without .zst extension)
prompts.select_file_pdf: Select the PDF file to analyze:
prompts.raster_mode_auto: Automatic (detects and rasterizes only pages containing plans or diagrams)
prompts.raster_mode_manual: Manual (rasterizes all pages or selected ones)
prompts.raster_mode_explanation: Choose the rasterization mode: automatic to process only pages with graphical elements (plans, diagrams), or manual to rasterize all PDF pages.

panels.interactive_content:
Welcome to the interactive mode of the JSON Processor.
This tool will help you explore and analyze your JSON files.
You will be guided through the different operations.

messages.processing_error: Processing failed. Check the error messages above.
messages.selection_jira_confluence: Selection of JIRA and Confluence files
messages.decompression_desc: Decompress a ZST file to restore the original JSON content

llm_summary.no_data_warning: No LLM-enriched data was found. Please check that:

llm_summary.warning_api_key: A valid OpenAI API key is available
llm_summary.warning_valid_input: The input files contain valid data
llm_summary.llamendex_usage_text:
LLM-enriched data is ready for ingestion into Llamendex with:
1. Concise content summaries
2. Thematic keywords
3. Extracted entities (people, organizations)
4. Sentiment analysis

These enrichments significantly improve the quality of search results
and enable advanced features such as sentiment filtering or
entity-based searching.

compression.keep_originals_help: Keep original JSON files in addition to compressed ones
compression.decompression_desc: Decompress a ZST file to restore the original JSON content

en.why_our_image_extraction_is_different: More Than OCR: Intelligent Technical Analysis
en.beyond_traditional_ocr_description: Our solution transforms technical documents into structured, actionable data, going far beyond simple text recognition.
en.structured_data_extraction_description: Each technical image is analyzed with expert precision, generating normalized, immediately usable JSON data.
en.engineering_description: Detailed analysis of technical diagrams, system schematics, and industrial plans.
en.medical_research_description: Precise data extraction from X-rays, scans, and clinical documents.
en.technical_documentation_description: Rapid transformation of complex documents into actionable insights.
en.transform_your_technical_documents: Transform Your Technical Documents into Actionable Intelligence
